featured.text: Newspapers, radio and TV stations, and websites have participated in the April 1 tradition of making 20 reports in order to fool their audiences.

definition.zh_def: 一種電子設備，用於接收和顯示視訊和音訊節目。
definition.en_def: An electronic device used for receiving and displaying video and audio programs.
definition.example: I like to watch movies on my TV in the evening.
